message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  I'm offering you a fair amount to settle this quickly.
Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way to start.
I appreciate the idea of a fair split, Bob, but time is money.  Let's meet somewhere closer to my last offer.
Let's find a middle ground.  I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still want a fair share.
This is a compromise, Bob.  I'm losing value with every passing round, and this offer is more than fair considering the circumstances.
Let's get closer. I'm willing to give you more, but I still need a decent share. We're running out of time.
Time is really starting to hurt us, Bob. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
